column4: hello everybody ; give me a solution of this question when i click on install updates in update manager i got a message that i am going to install software that can't  be authenticated
sudo aptitude install ubuntu-keyring ... once that's installed, it should be fine to ignore it, I doubt you even know how to add other repos  ;)
once you hit ok... it should be added  :/
i unlocked it and hot on add user and give user name and password for new user but how to add it
haha... try making the window taller?
no ok button is there and my eyesight is not weak
I didn't say it was... there should definitely be an ok button though.... what is your screen resolution?
so is it covering your entire screen? you can stretch the window off the screen... then right click the window title and hit 'move' to get to the bottom
okay thanks, the ok button was not visible due to resolution
one question how to change language for other user
i want to put hindi language for my mother and english for myself
you can't really via any tool... it'd have to be changed as the user logs in
thanks for finding ok button for me
moving it off screen allowed you to see it? or you being sarcastic? heh
